name: df-sitg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(csitg, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cuni(crn(cmeas)), cmpt(s2, crab(s3, co(cdm(cv(s1)), cmbfm, cfv(csigagen, cfv(ctopn, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(crn(cv(s3)), cfn), wral(s4, cdif(crn(cv(s3)), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cima(ccnv(cv(s3)), csn(cv(s4)))), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))))), co(cv(s0), cgsu, cmpt(s4, cdif(crn(cv(s2)), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), co(cfv(cfv(crrh, cfv(csca, cv(s0))), cfv(cv(s1), cima(ccnv(cv(s2)), csn(cv(s4))))), cfv(cvsca, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ sitg =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures)‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà { s3 ‚àà(dom(s1)[MblFnM](sigaGen `(TopOpen ` s0)))|(ran(s3)‚àà Fin ‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(ran(s3)\ {(0 ` s0)}),(s1 `(`' s3 " { s4 }))‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)))} ‚Ü¶(s0[gsum](s4 ‚àà(ran(s2)\ {(0 ` s0)})‚Ü¶(((RRHom `(Scalar ` s0))`(s1 `(`' s2 " { s4 })))[(√ó ` s0)]s4)))))
comment: Define the integral of simple functions from a measurable space ` dom m ` to a generic space ` w ` equipped with the right scalar product. ` w ` will later be required to be a Banach space. These simple functions are required to take finitely many different values: this is expressed by ` ran g e. Fin ` in the definition. Moreover, for each ` x ` , the pre-image ` ( ``' g " { x } ) ` is requested to be measurable, of finite measure. In this definition, ` ( sigaGen `` ( TopOpen `` w ) ) ` is the Borel sigma-algebra on ` w ` , and the functions ` g ` range over the measurable functions over that Borel algebra. Definition 2.4.1 of [Bogachev] p. 118. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Oct-2017.)
